忲字的基本解释

忲
tài
奢侈：“性亦奢忲。”

忲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tài］
［《集韻》他蓋切，去夳，透。］
骄纵；奢侈。

忲字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　忲； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页378第15
【集韻】與忕同。或作㥭。【張衡·西京賦】有憑虛公子者，心奓體忲。【註】志奢溢，體驕泰也。

忲字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
忲字的起名意思

暂无。

tài
Luxury: "Sex is also extravagant."

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tài］
["Ji Yun" he covers and cuts, Qu Qiao, thoroughly. ]
Pride; luxury.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　忲; Kangxi strokes: 8; Page number: page 378 15
【Jiyun】Same as Xin. Or make 㥭. [Zhang Heng·Xijing Fu] There are those who rely on the imaginary son, and the heart is full of enthusiasm. [Note] Chi is extravagant, and arrogant.
